effect.sword_shield: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
effect.legends_arceus: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.

short_effect.sword_shield: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.
